title: ADC Main LFT that is active.
body:
Would like to join a rank team that is active and plays a lot.
Currently Silver 2 although was Gold 1 before reset.
I have a mic and am able to join skype/teamspeak or whatever voice communication program you use.
My pool is Jinx Vayne Graves Corki. (Also able to play all roles well except top.)
My playstyle is very offensive carry.

IGN: vSkylar 
I'm a chill  guy 8) so I'm no raging trollerdog.

replies.body:
Hi, vSkylar.

I'm currently building a team, we could use an adc. Can I add you in game?
